pkgmetadata.longdescription: # GrangerThings ## DescriptionImplementation of Granger/Causality networks as described in this paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.6651 ## InstallationTODO## UsageTODO## SupportTODO## ContributingNot open for public contributions.## Authors and acknowledgmentTODO## LicenseTODO## Implementation choicesTODO: Quickhull choices, word choices/preferences, etc. Things that were underspecified in the paper. ## Project statusIn development.
